docs.snippet: The top two contenders in Croatia's general election battled on Friday over who would be best placed to cut taxes and boost growth, in a televised debate that put the economy at the forefront of a ballot that might not end a political deadlock....
docs.lead_paragraph: The top two contenders in Croatia's general election battled on Friday over who would be best placed to cut taxes and boost growth, in a televised debate that put the economy at the forefront of a ballot that might not end a political deadlock.

headline.main: Croatia Candidates Battle Over Tax Cuts Ahead of September Polls
headline.print_headline: Croatia Candidates Battle Over Tax Cuts Ahead of September Polls

docs.snippet: To the Israelites, identity was fluid, for humans as well as Jehovah....
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Israelites, identity was fluid, for humans as well as Jehovah.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Rabbi Mark Sameth argues gender identity has never in human history been fixed and gender fluidity was mark of civility and closeness to gods in ancient world; cites examples from Hebrew scripture; recounts struggle of his transgender cousin for recognition in 1970s and urges acceptance in ongoing gender debate.

docs.snippet: American archer Brady Ellison shot with the steely gaze of a game hunter but wept in relief after securing the men's individual bronze at the Olympics on Friday, having nearly tossed away the medal chance as he raged at himself for one errant arro...
docs.lead_paragraph: American archer Brady Ellison shot with the steely gaze of a game hunter but wept in relief after securing the men's individual bronze at the Olympics on Friday, having nearly tossed away the medal chance as he raged at himself for one errant arrow.

headline.main: Archery: Big Game Hunter Ellison Bags Elusive Medal
headline.print_headline: Archery: Big Game Hunter Ellison Bags Elusive Medal

docs.snippet: Sun Yang of China won't be defending his Olympic title in the men's 1,500-meter freestyle....

docs.snippet: A former journalist turned college professor, Kelly Whiteside is watching NBC's prime-time Olympics coverage this month for the first time in 16 years. She's surprised at what she's found — not because the programs have changed so much, but ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A former journalist turned college professor, Kelly Whiteside is watching NBC's prime-time Olympics coverage this month for the first time in 16 years. She's surprised at what she's found — not because the programs have changed so much, but because they haven't.

headline.main: Is NBC's Prime-Time Olympics Due for a Change?
headline.print_headline: Is NBC's Prime-Time Olympics Due for a Change?

docs.snippet: Lucy Li won the Junior PGA Championship on Friday at age 13, a year off LPGA Tour star Lexi Thompson's record in the event....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lucy Li won the Junior PGA Championship on Friday at age 13, a year off LPGA Tour star Lexi Thompson's record in the event.

docs.snippet: Looking to bounce back from the disappointment of missing out on a synchronized diving medal, Jennifer Abel of Canada led the way in the preliminaries of women's 3-meter springboard Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Looking to bounce back from the disappointment of missing out on a synchronized diving medal, Jennifer Abel of Canada led the way in the preliminaries of women's 3-meter springboard Friday.

headline.main: Canada's Abel Leads Olympic Prelims of Women's Springboard
headline.print_headline: Canada's Abel Leads Olympic Prelims of Women's Springboard

docs.snippet: Bradley Wiggins slowly dismounted his track bike for the final time, basking in the cheers of an adoring crowd, and was greeted by two of the most decorated Olympians in British history....
